body_html:
The same things happened to me.
I use ignore_index as 255.
Normal labels are from 0 to 40.
But every time when there is 255 in the groud-truth, I get this error in the backward.
I checked that there is no -1 in ground-truch.

body:
The same things happened to me.
I use ignore_index as 255.
Normal labels are from 0 to 40.
But every time when there is 255 in the groud-truth, I get this error in the backward.
I checked that there is no -1 in ground-truch.
